At the time these products were extremely harsh, so Claus created the first naturally mild shampoo on the market and named it Bio-Groom. Today, over 50 years later, we are still family owned and operated and proud to continue innovating and manufacturing natural, gentle pet grooming products. View Bio-Groom Favorites! Natural, Human-Grade Ingredients All our products are manufactured from the finest, natural, human-grade ingredients. Our products are of such high quality that us humans can safely use them. Transparent Labeling Over-the-counter pet products are not regulated in the US and many of our competitors don’t put the full ingredient list on their products. We label each of our products as if they were human-regulated items: with a complete list of INCI named ingredients. Ingenuity We listen to our consumers and develop all our products to address specific issues about your pet’s coat and skin care needs. Your Pet Deserves the Best Gentle Ingredients All Bio-Groom products are pH-balanced and free of common allergens, parabens, dyes, soap, artificial thickeners, and harsh chemicals. For extra sensitive pets we also offer products with no sulfate, alcohol, or perfumes. Additionally, we have a number of products that are tear-free. We’ve designed our products to clean effortlessly without stripping natural protective oils from the skin and coat. Made in the USA All Bio-Groom products are proudly made in the USA. We consider it an integral part of our heritage and a privilege to claim that all our products are made in the USA! Don't Just Groom - Bio-Groom! Cruelty Free & Kind to Our Planet Every product is developed and manufactured without any experimentation on animals. The natural cleansers we use in our products are derived from regrowable and 100% green sources of corn, coconut, or palm kernel oils. Quality Control Our chemistry staff and on-site laboratory provides us with the unique ability to create new products while maintaining uncompromising product consistency.
